actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A Bill to amend Title XVI of the Social Security Act to permit States to replace supplementary payments with vendor payments on behalf of residents of certain facilities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to permit States to make payments to vendors of social services such as institutions, foster homes, or group living arrangements on behalf of residents of such institutions, foster homes, or arrangements as an alternative to State supplementary payments which are currently provided.

titles.title: A Bill to amend Title XVI of the Social Security Act to permit States to replace supplementary payments with vendor payments on behalf of residents of certain facilities, and for other purposes.
